index.description: An innovative platform that will professionalize your LIVHE!

moods.deleteError: Could not delete mode. Please try again.
moods.freePlanLimit: Free plan users can only have up to 3 Game Modes in total. Please delete a mode before adding another one or become PREMIUM.

presetConfig.title: Mode Actions Panel
presetConfig.noPresets: No presets found for this mood.
presetConfig.delayDescription: The delay is the time in seconds that the action will be executed.
presetConfig.delayInfo: The delay is only applied when the action is triggered by the SHORTCUT key or PLAY button. Live monitoring is not affected by this delay.
presetConfig.chatWordPlaceholder: Enter the word that should appear in chat
presetConfig.likesCountPlaceholder: Enter the required number of likes
presetConfig.overlayVideoPlaceholder: URL of the video to display in the overlay
presetConfig.confirmEditMessage: Are you sure you want to save changes to preset?
presetConfig.confirmAddMessage: Are you sure you want to add preset ?
presetConfig.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this preset? This action cannot be undone.
presetConfig.freePlanOverlayLimit: The free plan allows only 1 overlay video. Upgrade to premium to add more overlay videos or remove the existing one.
presetConfig.freePlanActionLimit: The free plan allows only 5 Actions. Upgrade to premium to create more Actions or delete an existing action.
presetConfig.overlayUrlCopied: The overlay URL has been copied to the clipboard.
presetConfig.serverError: Could not start the server. Start the Application as administrator.
presetConfig.serverAlreadyStopped: The server is already closed or was not started.
presetConfig.name: Name
presetConfig.keyboardShortcutTip: Tip: Press the desired combination (e.g., Alt+9, Ctrl+Shift+K, Alt+Num6). Avoid using Tab as it is reserved for navigation.
presetConfig.monitoringInfo: This button starts/stops monitoring the TikTok live. When active, the system will detect gifts, likes, and chat messages to trigger the configured actions.
presetConfig.presetCopiedDescription: Preset data has been copied. Edit the name and save to create a copy.

premium.name: Premium

creators.name: Premium + Creators Club

requirementsList.requiriment: Complete your test live within 24 HOURS to be eligible for approval.
requirementsList.availability: Availability of at least 3 minimum daily hours;
requirementsList.diamonds: Cannot have received more than 150K diamonds in live (if you already do lives on TikTok);
requirementsList.video: Have at least 1 video posted on TikTok;
requirementsList.commitment: Have commitment and dedication to work;

profile.updateErrorDescription: Could not update your profile information

profile.confirmCancelSubscription: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
profile.cancelSubscriptionWarning: By cancelling, you will lose premium benefits at the end of the current cycle

eulaConfig.title: 1. EULA Configuration
eulaConfig.description: To start the server for the first time, you need to accept the Minecraft EULA. Follow these steps:
steps: Locate the eula.txt file in the server folder
Change the line eula=false to eula=true
Save the file and restart the server

portConfig.title: 2. Port Configuration
portConfig.description: The default Minecraft port is 25565. Make sure to:
steps: Check if the port is available on your server
Set the server port (as desired) in the server.properties file
Configure port forwarding on your router if needed

passwordConfig.title: 3. Server Password
steps: Set a strong and unique password

overlayLink.title: Overlay Link
overlayLink.urlDescription: Use this link in OBS Studio or other streaming software as a browser source.

steps.2: 2. In OBS Studio, add a new source of type "Browser"
steps.3: 3. Paste the link in the URL field
steps.4: 4. Set the width and height according to your resolution
steps.5: 5. Check the option "Refresh browser when scene becomes active"

overlayLink.urlCopiedDescription: The overlay link has been copied to your clipboard.

success.title: Payment successful!
success.description: Your plan has been activated. Enjoy all premium benefits.

cancel.title: Payment cancelled
cancel.description: You can try again at any time.
